name: Ascend (itch) (William Zollman)
description:
-----Background-----

You are being held captive within your own reoccurring dreams.  Fight to free yourself and escape back into the waking world.

-----Overview-----

This game is a very difficult single-player experience, so don't feel bad if you don't win right away.  Explore different rooms, defeat various enemies and bosses, and gather runes and upgrades to grow your strength.

* Game is still in development, so I really appreciate feedback*


-----Controls-----

WASD or Arrow Keys   --->   move
Left Click   --->   shoot
Right Click   --->   shoot a burst
hold (Spacebar and Left Click)   --->   frenzy (rapid fire shooting)
Esc or P   --->   pause
M  --->   toggle minimap extension
